tweet_text: @ESPNNBA LeBron James drills a HUGE 3FG to beat the shot clock with 1:09 remaining in G2 of the 2011 NBA Finals, putting the HEAT ahead 93-88 and stopping a worrisome Mavs run long enough to survive; Miami goes up 2-0 in the series and eventually 3-1 heading into Game 5 in Dallas. https://t.co/cBZaQT7Y9g https://t.co/5uUwPKYr90
text_en: LeBron James drills a HUGE FG to beat the shot clock with :09 remaining in G2 of the NBA Finals, putting the HEAT ahead -88 and stopping a worrisome Mavs run long enough to survive; Miami goes up -0 in the series and eventually -1 heading into Game in Dallas.

tweet_text: I had to make a decision and that is to leave than stay and drag the whole team down with me. I was a sinking ship that time, or so I thought i was. I was filled with so much self doubt. I questioned my own self as a leader, as a student and as a person.
